definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The more low noise control, is the sound-absorbing effect with the censored box.
sentences.chinese: 更低的噪音控制，就是加裝具有吸音效果的消音箱。

sentences.english: Sound absorbing material has been used in walls and ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁和天花板使用了吸音材料。

sentences.english: For example, acoustical tile on a ceiling serves to reduce the propagation of sound.
sentences.chinese: 比如，頂棚上安裝吸音板就有助於減少聲音的傳播。

sentences.english: If the internal acoustical material must be used, the fixing gasket shall be with mesh.
sentences.chinese: 若必須使用內部吸音材料，固定襯墊應帶網孔。

sentences.english: Two sound-absorbing panels commonly used in the walls or ceilings decoration.
sentences.chinese: 兩種吸音板常用於牆面或天花裝飾。

sentences.english: But in the sound-absorbing effect of the can completely trust it.
sentences.chinese: 但是在吸音效果方面則可以完全信任它。

sentences.english: This time we innovate to have wooden material plus sound-absorbing foam as our stage backdrop.
sentences.chinese: 這次是以創新的木質材料加上吸音海綿作爲舞臺設計。

sentences.english: Arras since is decorated, also be sound-absorbing layer.
sentences.chinese: 掛毯既是裝飾，也是吸音層。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
